Title: Relates to waiving the twenty-four hour waiting period for solemnizing a marriage after a license is issued for persons serving in the armed forces; repealer
Summary: Waives the twenty-four hour waiting period for solemnizing a marriage after a license is issued for persons serving in the armed forces.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง13-c, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to waiving the waiting period for solemnizing a marriage for members of the armed services and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
